title: Miniature Portrait of an Unknown Man
medium: enamel on copper; gilt metal frame
provenance_text:
Harry Oatway [-1917?], London, England, until sometime before November 1917 [1]; Estate of Harry Oatway, November 1917; (sold at American Art Association, New York, NY, November 7, 1917); purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, November 7, 1917; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] This name was recorded by Herbert DuPuy as "Henry" Oatway. Oatway must have died prior to November of 1917, when his collection went up for auction at the American Art Association as the collection of the "late Mr. Harry Oatway."
